entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
